logger.message: enter into subflow of create cases

db:insert.db:sql: insert into cvd_case_master(case_id,source, case_type, first_name, last_name, phone, email, date_of_birth, national_id, national_id_type, street_address, city, state, postal, country, create_date, update_date, create_by, update_by) values(:case_id,:source, :case_type, :first_name, :last_name, :phone, :email, TO_DATE(:date_of_birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), :national_id, :national_id_type, :street_address, :city, :state, :postal, :country, TO_DATE(:create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(:update_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), :create_by, :update_by)
